cards.name: Simple Mutation

cards.name: Versatile Power+

relics.name: Innate Mutation
relics.description: The first time you draw a Status or Curse card each turn, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: A symbol of ever-shifting and adaptation to your surroundings.

relics.name: Running Shoes
relics.description: The first time you gain Distance each turn, increase the Distance gained by 1.
relics.flavorText: You ought to move at a higher velocity than normal.

relics.name: Trap Manual
relics.description: Whenever you make 3 Traps, gain 1 Trap slot.
relics.flavorText: You should never forget the manual for your complex machinery.

relics.name: Shot Glass
relics.description: Cards with 'shot' in the name deal 3 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: A reimagined spyglass strapped to the side of your bow. Doubles as a drink holder...?

relics.name: Signal Flare
relics.description: The first time you apply 10 Marked each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Not really it's intended use, but to survive, you've got to improvise.

relics.name: Ironskin Outfit
relics.description: When you receive attack damage in Close Range, gain 5 Plated Armor. Lose 1 more Distance at the start of each turn.
relics.flavorText: It may slow you down, but it gives you a different kind of survivability...

relics.name: Longbow
relics.description:
Start each combat with 1 additional Distance.
While in Long Range, gain 3 Strength.
While in Close Range, lose 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The last thing they'll never see.

relics.name: Sharpened Dagger
relics.description: Gain 3 Strength while in Close Range.
relics.flavorText: Good for skinning beasts, whittling new arrows, or slicing someone that gets too close.

relics.name: Advanced Evolution
relics.description: Replaces Innate Mutation. Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, draw 1 card. The first time you draw a Status or Curse card in a turn, gain [E].
relics.flavorText: When you're pushed to your limit, you start to go beyond what you thought was possible...

relics.name: Good Boy
relics.description: The first time you play an Attack each turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.
relics.flavorText: He's only the best boy in the whole wide world? Isn't he?! Yes he is!

keywords.name: Acid Trap
keywords.description: When you play 2 cards in a turn, remove Artifact from all enemies, and apply Poison, Weak, and Vulnerable.

keywords.name: Advantage
keywords.description: Prevents the next instance of turn-based Distance loss.

keywords.name: Bear Trap
keywords.description: When you lose 4 Distance in a turn, apply Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies.

keywords.name: Distance
keywords.description: Reduces incoming damage by 10% each, up to 7. Reduced by 2 each turn. You are in Close Range at Distance 0-2, Mid Range at distance 3-6, and Long Range at 7 and above.

keywords.name: Explosive Trap
keywords.description: When you gain 4 Distance in a turn, deal damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Fence Trap
keywords.description: When your Block is broken, gain Block and 1 Blur.

keywords.name: Flashbang Trap
keywords.description: When you play 2 Skills in a turn, apply Mark to all enemies.

keywords.name: Marked Trap
keywords.description: When you go a turn without being attacked, ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.

keywords.name: Poison Trap
keywords.description: When you play 3 Attacks in a turn, apply Poison to all enemies.

keywords.name: Trap
keywords.description: Placed in a Trap Slot. Activates when certain conditions are met.

keywords.name: Trap Trap
keywords.description: When you activate a Trap, fill your Trap slots with random Traps.
